thread.title: H.S. Roundup: Matt Crisafulli's goal lifts CBA soccer to victory
thread.title_full: H.S. Roundup: Matt Crisafulli's goal lifts CBA soccer to victory - Times Union

author: Staff reports
title: H.S. Roundup: Matt Crisafulli's goal lifts CBA soccer to victory
text:
Matt Crisafulli scored the lone goal of the game 10 minutes into the second half to lift CBA to a Suburban Council soccer win over Niskayuna on Thursday at Niskayuna High School .
The Brothers improved to 5-8 overall and 4-8 in the Suburban. The Silver Warriors dipped to 5-5-1.
Crisafulli, who returned from an injury on Thursday, scored off an assist from John McCane .
More boys' soccer: Chris Jupin and Malik Sykes scored in the first half and Kyle Landis added an insurance marker in the second half as Shenendehowa topped Albany, 3-0, in a Suburban Council contest. Jerry Lewandowski made two saves for the shutout. The Plainsmen held a 5-3 advantage in corners. ... Garrett Axtmann had a hat trick to spark Maple Hill (10-0) to a 6-0 win over Coxsackie-Athens in a Patroon Conference game. It was the 609th win for Wildcats coach Dan Gillespie . ... Ryan Uccellini recorded a hat trick and provided two assists to help Albany Academy crush Lansingburgh 8-0 in a Colonial Council matchup. Emanuel Gomez and Niko Moutopoulos added two goals apiece for the Cadets, who improved to 8-2 on the season. ... Giovanni Gomez scored a pair of goals and Ichabod Crane slipped past Fonda 3-2 in a Colonial game. Nick Johnston tallied the third goal for the Riders (9-1, 9-1 league), who are ranked 15th in the state in Class B.
Girls' volleyball: Sydney Buran had five kills, nine assists and an ace to lead Albany Academy to a Colonial Council win in straight sets (25-11, 25-17, 25-11) over Lansingburgh. Macy Anetzberger added 15 digs and one kill and Emily Padalino chipped in four kills, two blocks and one assist for the Bears. Serena D'Amico led Lansingburgh with five blocks and three kills. ... Libby Agresta had five service points, four aces, three kills and four digs to lead Shenendehowa over Albany, 25-17, 25-14, 25-7 in a Suburban Council match. Nicole Adams added 12 service points and three aces for the Plainsmen. Caitlyn LaBarge led Albany with three digs and two assists. ... Patroon Conference frontrunner Maple Hill beat Cairo-Durham, 25-15, 25-17, 25-7. Skylar Van Alstyne had 12 service points and Jackie Brathwaite added 15 service points and six kills for the Wildcats (13-0).
Field hockey: Sabrina Whitehouse scored two goals, including the game-winning score 2 minutes, 50 seconds into overtime, to give Greenwich (9-2, 7-1) a 2-1 win over Emma Willard . Marybeth Zahnleuter scored on a stroke for the Jaspers. Olivia Barnes made nine saves for the Witches, while Sasha Bonesteel stopped 10 shots for Emma Willard (3-4, 3-1).
